Object.OrgChart.Description.value: Displays the relations of an organization or similarly structured data. Starts at the top and allows for navigation through the hierarchy.

Object.OrgChart.MaxData.value: The maximum data limit is reached. The tree may display incorrectly.
Object.OrgChart.MaxData.comment: Warning in Org chart for when the max data limit has been reached (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.DummyWarn.value: The data contains multiple root nodes.
Object.OrgChart.DummyWarn.comment: Warning for when a single root node is missing

Object.OrgChart.CycleWarning.value: Data contains circular references, nodes are omitted.
Object.OrgChart.CycleWarning.comment: Warning for data that contains cycles, meaning some data will not be displayed (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.MissingRoot.value: No root node, check data for circular references.
Object.OrgChart.MissingRoot.comment: Error for when all data is cyclic, so no root nodes can be used (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.MaxChildren.value: Maximum number of child nodes reached, nodes are omitted.
Object.OrgChart.MaxChildren.comment: Warning for reaching the maximun number of child nodes to a single parent (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.LabelExpression.comment: Label for card label expressions in property panel (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.SubLabelExpression.comment: Label for card sub-label expressions for in property panel (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.ExtraLabelExpression.comment: Label for extra label expressions in property panel (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.ColorLabelExpression.comment: Label for color expressions in property panel (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.ExtraLabelDesc.value: Description is only visible when a measure is not used
Object.OrgChart.ExtraLabelDesc.comment: Clarification for when the description field is used (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.BackgroundColor.comment: Label for background color in property panel (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.FontColor.comment: Label for font color in property panel (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.IncludeDescendants.comment: Tooltip for the select descendants toggle button (rnt 200218)

Object.OrgChart.SingleSelect.comment: Tooltip for the select single node toggle button (rnt 200325)

Object.OrgChart.NavigationMode.comment: Label for presentation mode in property panel (rnt 200325)

Object.OrgChart.ExpandAll.comment: Option entire tree for presentation mode (rnt 200325)

Object.OrgChart.resizeOnExpand.comment: Option for resizing on expanding collapsing nodes (rnt 200325)
